jp_text: 《子供じゃあるまいし 自分に言い訳して　どうするの》→
google_translated: "I'm a child and say what to say to yourself" →

en_text: It's because he's here.
jp_text: 《あいつがいる。 ２年ぶりに　すぐ　そこに…》→
google_translated: "There is a guy.She soon she immediately after two years she is ... "→

en_text: Ever since that moment, I've barely  been able to contain my excitement.
jp_text: 《あの瞬間から テンション　上がりまくり》→

en_text: He's right here, watching me.
jp_text: 《あいつが　すぐ　そこで 私を見てる》

en_text: I've been playing the piano all this time in order to denounce the Arima Kousei everyone sees.
jp_text: 《私は　有馬　公生を 否定するために→

en_text: I knew she had it in her, but to play at this level...
jp_text: 《技術があるのは　知っている》

en_text: Let your feelings reach them!
jp_text: 《自分の思いを届けなさい！》

en_text: A fourteen-year-old girl has this audience enthralled.
jp_text: 《会場が　１４歳の女の子に 引き込まれていく》→
google_translated: "The venue is drawn into a 14-year-old girl" →

en_text: Is she really just a junior-high student?
jp_text: 《これが　中学生か？》

en_text: I'm going to denounce you.
jp_text: 《私は　あんたを否定してやる》→

en_text: Even if I lose—even if I get trounced—I'll deny you every time.
jp_text: 《負けたって ぶっ飛ばされたって→

en_text: I don't want to hear the Arima Kousei who plays to win competitions.
jp_text: 《コンクールのために弾く 有馬　公生なんて聴きたくない》→
google_translated: "I do not want to listen to Ayima purification that play for contest" →

en_text: I'm going to negate you with my playing.
jp_text: 《私のピアノで否定してやる》→

en_text: What I really want to hear...
jp_text: 《私が聴きたいのは…》

en_text: Are these her emotions?
jp_text: 《これは　彼女の感情…？》

en_text: Red and yellow.
jp_text: 《赤と黄色　怒りと…》

en_text: I became a pianist because of a performance that lasted just under four minutes.
jp_text: 《たった　４分足らずの演奏が 私をピアニストにした》→
google_translated: "The performance of 4 minutes in foot was pianisted by pianist" →

en_text: Come back. i used to look up to you, arima kousei. i want that guy back!
jp_text: 《戻ってこい　戻ってこい。 私が憧れた　有馬　公生》→
